trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Alsa is excited to see you.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_TODO_00<tab>Place the blue-flamed candles.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alsa.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_ALSA_000_001<tab>Ah, one of Master Matoya's guests. You've come at an opportune time.

TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_ALSA_000_002<tab>I was preparing to take a walk and tend to the candles about Slitherbough, and I would ask you assist me. I can think of no finer opportunity to learn more of our people.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_ALSA_000_003<tab>Take these three candles, and replace any that appear to be nearly spent. A simple task, I know, but I believe it will prove most illuminating.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_ALSA_000_004<tab>You need only place the three candles I gave you. I will take care of the rest.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_PRAYINGMAN03447_000_010<tab>A fresh candle. How thoughtful of you.

TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_PRAYINGMAN03447_000_011<tab>Whenever I'm feeling stressed, watching the flames helps settle my nerves. Something about the way they flicker and dance is so soothing to me. Perhaps you should give it a try sometime.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_PRAYINGMAN03447_000_012<tab>Pay me no mind. I'll be returning to work soon enough.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_HELPFULGIRL03447_000_020<tab>Thanks, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>. You're real good at placing candles.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_HELPFULGIRL03447_000_021<tab>Mama says the night sky has candles. Lots and lots of candles. So many you can't count them all. I bet I could, though!
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_HELPFULGIRL03447_000_022<tab>Have you seen the candles outside, in the sky? There's so many! Mama said there's too many to count, but I bet I could if I wanted.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_HELPFULGIRL03447_000_023<tab>They're really pretty, but I think I like the candles in here more.

TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_HELPFULGIRL03447_000_024<tab>Hey <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>, why do you dress so funny? Is it for your work? Mama makes medicine and Papa is a guard. He's always busy outside, so I try to help lots and lots inside.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_CANDLEWOMAN03447_000_030<tab>Beautiful, aren't they? Like the souls of the departed, burning bright in the sunless sea above.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_CANDLEWOMAN03447_000_031<tab>I often come here to pay respects to our forebears, reflecting on the sacrifices that allowed us to live as we do now.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_CANDLEWOMAN03447_000_032<tab>What do you see when you look into the flames?
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_ALSA_000_040<tab>You are returned, and enlightened by the experience, I trust. We are a quiet people, but conversation comes easy in the presence of the candles.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_ALSA_000_041<tab>Before the Flood, our worship would no doubt have been seen as profane. Sacrilege...
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_ALSA_000_042<tab>But it is the expression of our faith that defines us, not the object of our worship.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_ALSA_000_045<tab>I can but imagine what change may come to the Night's Blessed should the night ever return to us.
TEXT_LUCKZE013_03447_ALSA_000_046<tab>I can but imagine what change will come to the Night's Blessed now that the night has returned to us.
